SELECT DATE(s.sold_at) AS date, SUM(s.total_amount) AS value, 'ACTUAL' AS type FROM sales s
s.franchise_id = #{franchiseId} AND
s.sold_at BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
GROUP BY DATE(s.sold_at)

SELECT DATE(so.delivery_due_date) AS date, SUM(sod.quantity) AS value, 'ACTUAL' AS type FROM store_order so JOIN store_order_detail sod ON so.store_order_id = sod.store_order_id
so.franchise_id = #{franchiseId} AND
so.delivery_due_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
GROUP BY DATE(so.delivery_due_date)

SELECT DATE(po.created_at) AS date, SUM(pod.quantity) AS value, 'ACTUAL' AS type FROM purchase_order po JOIN purchase_order_detail pod ON po.purchase_order_id = pod.po_id WHERE po.created_at BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY DATE(po.created_at)

SELECT target_date AS date, predicted_value AS value, 'PREDICTED' AS type FROM prediction_result WHERE prediction_type = 'purchase_quantity' AND period_type = 'WEEKLY' AND target_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
